description: Flashcards covering atomic numbers, symbols, and masses of elements.

flashcards.question: What is the first element on the periodic table?
Which element has the atomic number 2?
Which element has an atomic mass of 9.0122?
What is the atomic number of Boron?
Which element has the atomic mass of 14.007?
What is the symbol of the element with atomic number 8?
Which element has the atomic number 9?
Which element has an atomic mass of 20.180?
